descriptionHtml:
This is Umbra 2.0.
I've upload it here because in Halo's site you can only download version 3.0.
In my opinion, and some other players, this version looks better than version 3.0.
That is why I have upload it here, for the player who prefer version 2.0 over 3.0.
Sorry for my bad english.










I did not create this mod, all credits go to:

Halofarm for the mod.
KURESE for the panties.
Eiries for the Abyssal Dremora.
BlueHole Studios for the lance.
HelloSanta and associated parties for the hair.

Halofarm's site link: http://mod.dysintropi.me/
Halofarm's permissions link: http://mod.dysintropi.me/about/
author: Halofarm
